entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 7.
